original: unfold essence_list. unfold essence_list in IH. unfold essence_list in conservation_3. unfold essence_list in conservation_2. simpl. destruct tl. - specialize (conservation_3 d hd tnil a la ls) as Hcons3. specialize (conservation_3 d hd tnil a la ls) as Hcons3'. specialize (conservation_2 d la) as Hcons2. rewrite Hcons3. rewrite <- Hcons3'. apply Nat.le_add_r. - specialize (conservation_3 d hd (tcons t tl) a la ls) as Hcons3. specialize (conservation_3 d hd (tcons t tl) a la ls) as Hcons3'. specialize (conservation_2 d (prec_cons a la ls)) as Hcons2. rewrite Hcons3. rewrite <- Hcons3'. apply Nat.add_le_mono; auto.
